data.title: Current local time in Croatia
data.meta_description: Find out current local time in Croatia and time zone changes. Explore sunrise, sunset, moonrise and moonset time in cities of Croatia.
data.text:
Thursday, August 15, 2024 at 15:58 +02:00

UTC/GMT Offset: +02:00 hours

Time zone: +02:00 - +02:00

Daylight saving: Daylight saving time is currently observed.

All populated places of Croatia are located in one time zone.

Croatia on the map

Other names of Croatia:

English: Republic of Croatia

Croatian: Republika Hrvatska

Capital

Zagreb

Neighbors

Croatia has 6 neighboring countries:

Bosnia and Herzegovina, Hungary, Montenegro, Serbia, Slovenia, Serbia and Montenegro

Area

56,542 km2

Population

4,491,000

Top-level domain

.hr
